name: Cerebral Escape
description:
By Carl J. and Oliver D.

Welcome to Cerebral Escape! 

In this game, you play as a prisoner in a virtual prison who had recently obtained the power of being able to distract the enemies around you in order for you to sneak around them and escape the prison! 

Basic controls: Use WASD to move, and arrow keys to shoot bombs or EMPs; to equip the bomb, press B, and to equip your EMP, press N. Bombs can only affect the sentinels in its range and will recharge over short amount of time, while EMPs only affect the scanners in range and are scattered around the map for you to pick up.

Try to find a way to escape, or maybe there's no where to run...
developers: NYU Game Center - High School Programs
